name: Samuel Otieno
comment: Unity High inspired me to dream big. The teachers are supportive and the environment is friendly.

name: Amina Njeri
comment: I loved the diversity and the many clubs. Sports day is always fun!

name: Brian Mwangi
comment: Great learning facilities and amazing friends. I will miss this school.

name: Dennis Mchana
comment: Wachoro we want Best school ever. I will miss this school.
